captions.text: (Finebros) So today we have this for you.
It's not a bug, is it?

- (gasping) 
- Oh my god! What is that?
Aaaaah!
Eww!
Okay. That's lovely.

I can't even look at it.
It looks gross.
What is that?
Looks like something I would eat, actually.

- Is it still alive?
- Or anything? It better not be alive.
What? What do you mean, alive?!
Oh, it's cow tongue.
Cow tongue?! Really?
Is this like a pig liver?
Is it a dog?
It looks like a tail of a platypus.

This part right here...this part...
kinda looks like bacon.
You cut that up, you got bacon.

(gasping) Oh my god.
Is it a snake?
The top sort of looks like a tongue.

Now you get to look at it!
You look at it!
Look at this mess of horrible poop!

- Ew!
- Ew, you touched it. You touched it.
Stop poking it, Shannon.
Ooh, that reeks!
It smelled awful!
Smells like halibut.
It smells like a dumpster.

Just by the look of it, 
I would not want to eat it.
Do we have to eat it?
I'm not eating it.
Do you want me to die?
(whimpering) I don't wanna eat it.
Are you sure I can eat this?
Looks different when it's cooked.

Is that really it?
Nah, that's not it.

You want to feed me cow tongue!
You want to feed me it.
There's no way.
(sniffing)
Hmm. Smells like chicken.
Smells good.
Mmmm....I don't wanna--ewwww!
No! If it's gross, I am so mad at you.

It's just chicken from Chipoltle.
You want to feed that to me.
Yeah, you would.
It tastes like pork.
Hmm, it's beef.

Hmm...I have no idea what this is.
It's just really good.
It's actually not that bad.
It just tastes like beef or chicken.
Very, very greasy.
It needs a bit more salt.
It doesn't taste like what it smelled like.
Go on, [inaudible].
It tastes better than it looks.
(Finebros) It's actually cow tongue.
Ewwwwwwwwwwwwww!
(gasping) Ewww!
(gagging)
Is that a term?
So I'm eating a tongue?!
Wait, does that look like our tongues?

- That's the weirdest thing I've ever eaten.
- Yeah, it is.
Why would you give me cow tongue?
Ew, ew, ew, ew, ewwwww!

Still tastes good.
That's all that matters, right?

I'm actually glad that I ate it because now 
I know what cow tongue tastes like.

(Finebros) So, yes or no.
Do you recommend

- that people try cow tongue?
- No!
Yeah.
Yeah, eat it.

I'm gonna go back home and tell my dad,
"Can I have some cow tongue?"

- I would recommend it.
- I'd recommend it.
It's just a part of a cow.

We can eat it.
It doesn't matter.
It's a lot better than you think.

It tastes good, and also 
kids feel free to eat it.

Yes, if they add more 
seasoning and flavoring.
No.
You guys let me eat this junk food?

That is so gross that I 
cannot even tell my mom!

Hope you enjoyed the first 
episode of Kids Versus Food.

If you have any other food 
that you'd want to see us take on,
let us know in the comments.
I'm never eating that again!

I don't know about you guys,
but I'm sure enjoying this beef tongue!
